bio:
Jing Dai is a Visiting Assistant Professor of Accounting at NYU Shanghai. She received Ph.D. in Accountancy and MBA from Baruch College, City University of New York. Her research interests include social capital, corporate governance, and cost behavior. Professor Dai is a member of the American Accounting Association. She is also a grant winner of Doctoral Student Research Grant from the City University of New York in 2016.

Education

  • PhD, Business-Accounting, Baruch College-City University of New York, 2017
  • MBA, Baruch College-City University of New York, 2014
  • BA, Finance, Southwestern University of Finance and Economics, 2012
  • BA, Economics, Southwestern University of Finance and Economics, 2012


Languages

  • English
  • Chinese
